data.message: GSAP ScrollTrigger patterns: 1) Always gsap.registerPlugin(ScrollTrigger) to prevent tree-shaking. 2) Pin sections with pin: true, end: '+=500' for scroll distance. 3) Scrub links animation to scrollbar - use scrub: 1 for 1-second smoothing. 4) Start/end use 'top center', 'bottom 80%' syntax. 5) toggleActions: 'play pause resume reset' controls 4 scroll states. 6) snap: 'labels' for section snapping. 7) markers: true for debugging. 8) Animate children of pinned elements, not the pinned element itself.
